channel.title: Comments on: World of Warcraft hackers using Sony BMG rootkit

item.title: By: Miku
item.dc:creator: Miku
item.description: I am an advid WoW player. This is going to ruin the game. I have(and every other WoW player) known about "The Warden" for a very long time. Blizzard put this notification in it s "Terms of Use" clause that we have to accept after every upgrade. The only people who don't like it are the scumbags trying to cheat. I saw Ultima take the big dive because of cheats and hacks. WoW is the best online game ever! I don't want it to end up like Ultima.
item.content:encoded:
I am an advid WoW player. This is going to ruin the game. I have(and every other WoW player) known about “The Warden” for a very long time. Blizzard put this notification in it
s “Terms of Use” clause that we have to accept after every upgrade. The only people who don’t like it are the scumbags trying to cheat. I saw Ultima take the big dive because of cheats and hacks. WoW is the best online game ever! I don’t want it to end up like Ultima.
